alert.note: Alert for Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Challis, Pahsimeroi Valleys; Frank Church Wilderness; Lost River Range; Lost River Valleys; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region; Wood River Foothills (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 2:55PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Winds over 45 mph will impact portions of southeastern Custer, Blaine, southwestern Butte, northern Lincoln and north central Minidoka Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 253 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong thunderstorms extending from to Kimama to near Blaine, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated and mesonet observations. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hailey, Ketchum, Sun Valley, Carey, Mackay, Grouse, Mackay Reservoir, Little Wood Reservoir, Picabo, Bellevue, Richfield, Gannett, Chilly Barton Flat, Trail Creek Pass, Sunbeam, Galena Lodge, Craters Of The Moon, Clayton, Summit Reservoir and Shoshone Ice Caves. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This line of storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
